org.sindice.siren.index.codecs.siren10

Class Siren10PostingsFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.codecs.PostingsFormat
      • org.sindice.siren.index.codecs.siren10.Siren10PostingsFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.lucene.util.NamedSPILoader.NamedSPI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Siren10AForPostingsFormat, Siren10VIntPostingsFormat

    public abstract class Siren10PostingsFormat
extends org.apache.lucene.codecs.PostingsFormat
    Abstraction over the SIREn 1.0 postings format.

    Subclasses must provide a pre-configured instance of the Siren10BlockStreamFactory.
